description:
MyTime is the most convenient way to book appointments with over 2 million local businesses, 24/7. Schedule an appointment for a haircut, massage, dog grooming, and hundreds of other services from nearly any business in your city. 

Don’t call…just click! MyTime lets you book anytime, from anywhere - right from your iPhone.  You can also reschedule or cancel appointments booked through MyTime without having to call the business. This means you can organize your life whenever it’s convenient for you - even if the business is closed for the day!

MyTime also has exclusive discounted appointment times, not available anywhere else!  Save up to 60% off the business’s normal prices by booking their off-peak times displayed prominently in the app. It’s like happy hour for services.

Booking appointments has never been easier: 
• Book 24/7 with millions of businesses - Find the time and location that works for you. Why operate on their time when you can book on "my time" - the time that's most convenient for you
• Real-time availability - See real-time appointment calendars and receive instant confirmation for hundreds of thousands of connected businesses
• 100+ service types - Browse services by category including Health & Beauty, Pets, Automotive, Medical & Dental, Home & Garden and Fitness
• Rich descriptions - View information about the businesses such as their services, prices, photos, and reviews from MyTime and Yelp
• Book your favorites - Your handy Favorites page allows for 1-click rebooking of your favorite businesses.  We’ll even remind you when it’s time. You can import your favorite businesses directly from your iPhone calendar and contacts to easily populate your Favorites page
• Intuitive search - Find the best business for you by filtering by preferred appointment time, location, and rating 
• Reschedule and cancel with ease - Plans changed?  It just takes 1-click to reschedule or cancel an appointment booked with MyTime
• Always free - MyTime has NO service charges whatsoever 

Interested in becoming a MyTime business? Just email team@mytime.com with your business name and contact info. 

Have questions, problems or feedback about the app? Reach out to us at support@mytime.com. We’d love to hear from you!
releaseNotes:
Welcome to the newest version of the MyTime app, designed for iOS 8! Our latest updates include:

* Minor bug fixes

Thanks for using MyTime, and we hope you continue to book all your appointments through the app!

Happy Bookings!
The MyTime Team
